definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The school also serves as match-maker between the gold and diggers.
sentences.chinese: 这所学校还充当了有钱人和拜金女的媒人。

sentences.english: And they worry if they go out hunting girls they’d only find gold diggers.
sentences.chinese: 他们担心，如果去追求女孩，只会引来拜金女。

definition: children of entrepreneurs who became wealthy under Deng Xiaoping's economic reforms in the 1980s/see also 窮二代|穷二代[qiong2 er4 dai4]
to worship money/to be mad about money
"Mr Perfect" (i.e. tall, rich and handsome) (Internet slang)
"Ms Perfect" (i.e. fair-skinned, rich and beautiful) (Internet slang)
(Internet slang) guy who grew up in the countryside and gained a foothold in the city through hard work
"green tea bitch", a girl who seems innocent and charming but is actually calculating and manipulative
to live off a rich man
(Internet slang) spoiled city girl from a rich family
